name: webhooks-alternative
description: A webhook testing application with React frontend and Rails backend

scripts.install:all: npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend
scripts.start:frontend: cd webhooks-frontend && npm run build && npx serve -s build -l 3000
scripts.start:backend: cd webhooks-backend && bundle exec rails server -p 3001 -b 0.0.0.0
scripts.dev:backend: cd webhooks-backend && bundle exec rails server -p 3001 -b 0.0.0.0
